body.p: “Pm launch boat & paddle to Fair Haven- still very cold- The most splendid show of ice shandeliers- casters- hour glass (1/2) that I ever saw or imagined about the piers of the bridges- surpassing any crystal so large- Rather like the bases of columns –teraced pedestals –that is it- the prototypes of the ornaments of the copings & capitals –perfect & regular sharp cone-shaped drops hang from the first figure a few inches above the water. I should have described it then. It would have filled many pages.”
